children.subject: you should be using https for your company's website

history.content:
Hi, 

My name is Paul. I started a company called blockpoint (www.blockpoint.systems) and am looking for a couple of developers to fill summer internship positions [Web Developers, Data Analysts, Database Developers, Computer Vision Algorithm Development]. All position would start off as a paid summer internship based out of the SF/Berkeley area and could lead to something more.

A little bit about the company: We provide SQL like blockchain based databases, have revenue, and are gearing up for a Series A raise. We are currently working with companies in the Healthcare, Fintech, and government regulator industries and are in the process of solidifying and further building out the system to expand.  

What we are looking for: 

Web Developers:

- React js/Native experience

Data Analyst:

- Previous experience

- Ability to 'verbalize' data

- Can determine useful metrics in abstract or verticle general information

Database Developers:

- Golang experience

- Database management system development experience

- Has taken 186

Computer Vision Algorithm Development:

- Open CV experience

- Can design algorithms that model simpler human procedures of video analysis

All work would be done in a real, in-production system. Could be a great opportunity for gaining industry experience and for building cool production applications.

If you're at all interested, feel free to shoot me an email at     paul<at>blockpoint<dot>systems
history.subject: Summer Internship Opportunities
